command: execute @s[scores={分队=1..4,出局观战=0,gameSTART=1,own_xp=100..}] ~~~ tag @s add milk
execute @s[scores={分队=1..4,出局观战=0,gameSTART=1},tag=milk] ~~~ scoreboard players remove @s own_xp 100
execute @s[scores={分队=1..4,出局观战=0,gameSTART=1},tag=milk] ~~~ playsound note.harp @s
execute @s[scores={分队=1..4,出局观战=0,gameSTART=1},tag=milk] ~~~ give @s a:jxldp_milk 1
execute @s[scores={分队=1..4,出局观战=0,gameSTART=1,own_xp=..99},tag=!milk] ~~~ tag @s add mmmm
execute @s[scores={分队=1..4,出局观战=0,gameSTART=1},tag=mmmm] ~~~ playsound mob.endermen.portal @s
